name: haxtheweb-desktop
description: HAX Electron app to run haxcms-nodejs via desktop app launcher
author: HAXTheWeb core team

scripts.release: npm run build && commit-and-tag-version && git push --follow-tags origin main && npm publish
scripts.pack: npm run build && cd .. && npx @electron/packager ./desktop/ haxtheweb-desktop --executable-name=haxtheweb-desktop --out=./desktop/builds --icon=./desktop/dist/favicon.ico --ignore="^(?!(.*node_modules|.*dist))(.*src.*.*screenshots.*|.*tsconfig.*|.*_sites.*|.*_published.*|.*_archived.*|.*builds.*|.*README.*|.*git.*)" --asar.unpack=*.{node,dll,db} --overwrite
